text: of the model-based estimates (Table 2). Using the estimated parameter values, we predicted the trend of the 2019-nCoV infection. Under the current intervention (before 22 January 2020), the number of infected individuals (I(t)) time and peak value. Under the current intervention (before 22 January 2020), the number of infected individuals (I(t)) is expected to peak on around 10 March 2020, with a peak size of 1.63 × 105 infectious individuals.𝒄 𝟎.𝟑𝒄 𝟎.𝟏𝒄 Peak Time 19.3 days 22.6 days 33.8 days 61.3 days 3.4 days Value of 𝐼 at peak time 1.63×105 1.5×105 1.15×105 6.68×104 2.42×103 Parameter 𝑞 𝑞 5𝑞 10𝑞 15𝑞 20𝑞 Peak time 19.3 days 15.1 days 12.8 days 11.4
